title: Development of Reality-Based Differential Equation System-Solving Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Solutions for first-order ordinary differential equations, basic matrix operations, and proportional reasoning skills
context.additional_context: Primarily based on smartphone-accessible learning materials, with enhanced modeling activities in face-to-face sessions.

learning_goals: Learners can select numerical/analytical solutions for systems of second-order ordinary differential equations based on real-world problem contexts
Learners can visually/numerically represent solutions to differential equation systems using proportional reasoning strategies appropriate to specific contexts
Through peer feedback, learners can identify and correct logical errors inherent in their own solutions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
